body:
Hey guys,



Is it possible to have dynamic u-values in E+?

If I create a material with a certain conductivity and a schedule, that accounts for the changes in the conductivity over the year, how do I get E+/the honeybee components to couple the two?

If not does somebody have an alternative suggestion to account for the changes of the u-value?  

Thanks!,

/Christian
topic: Dynamic U-values in E+ and Honeybee
